Description: Papyrus; Demotic legal text recto and verso. A unique Ptolemaic prototype/model for how to draw up a land lease. It has a date of year 5 = year 41 which apparently does not exist and may thus just be a sample date. Part fo same model contract is EA 10643.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Martin, Cary J., How to Write a Demotic Legal Document: P. BM EA 10648, in: Widmer, G. / Devauchelle, D. (ed.): Actes du IXe congrès international des études démotiques, Paris, 31 août - 3 septembre 2005 (Bibliothèque d‘Étude 147), 2009, p. 195-222.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (69161) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/69161)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bloom, insect attack, discoloured Black ink Tabbed: silk Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: good
